publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Benjamin Took, printer to the Kings most excellent Majesty; and are to be sold by Samuel Helsham at the Colledge-Arms in Castle-street,

notesStmt.note: Title from caption and opening lines of text.
At end of text: Given at the Council-chamber in Dublin this 12th, day of June 1685.
On the petition of the merchants as to the fraudulent practices of butter packers and coopers ... -- Steele.
Steele notation: Arms 185. consi- only p.2) and p.3) twelve p.4) the de-.
